akn:section.akn:heading: Financial Improvement and Audit Remediation Plan

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Financial Improvement and Audit Remediation Plan.—

akn:content.akn:p: (c) The selection of audit remediation service providers shall be based, among other appropriate criteria, on qualifications, relevant experience, and capacity to develop and implement corrective action plans to address internal control and compliance deficiencies identified during a financial statement or program audit.
